roleset.name: to take or have a part in
roleset.note: PARTAKE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'partake' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. Comparison with 'participate'. (from partake.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: McDonald 's Corp. said [0] third-quarter earnings rose 14 % on a hefty sales gain , but domestic franchisees apparently did n't partake of the improvement .
